title: LLM简单评测_2024_2_26
content:
#traing_of_fintuning使用freeze进行微调，目前微调结果如下：微调基于/llm/LLaMA-Factory/zephyr-7b-lora-export，各个情况下的评估代码以及评估结果如下所示：
zephyr-7b-alpha评估代码：CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0 python src/evaluate.py     –model_name_or_path HuggingFaceH4/zephyr-7b-alpha  –template vanilla     –quantization_bit 4     –task ceval     –split validation     –lang zh     –n_shot 5     –batch_size 4
评估结果：Average: 43.24STEM: 44.65Social Sciences: 46.18Humanities: 42.02Other: 40.36
/llm/LLaMA-Factory/zephyr-7b-lora-export，评估代码：CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0 python src/evaluate.py     –model_name_or_path /llm/LLaMA-Factory/zephyr-7b-lora-export  –template vanilla     –quantization_bit 4     –task ceval     –split validation     –lang zh     –n_shot 5     –batch_size 4 
评估结果：Average: 41.53                                                                                                                  STEM: 40.47Social Sciences: 46.18Humanities: 42.80Other: 38.54
/llm/LLaMA-Factory/saves/Zephyr-7B-Alpha-Chat/freeze/train_2024-01-01-23-13 （本次）评估代码：CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1 accelerate launch  src/evaluate.py     –model_name_or_path /llm/LLaMA-Factory/saves/Zephyr-7B-Alpha-Chat/freeze/train_2024-01-01-23-13 –template vanilla    –quantization_bit 4     –task ceval     –split validation     –lang zh     –n_shot 5     –batch_size 4评估结果：Average: 43.16                                                                                                                  STEM: 42.56Social Sciences: 48.00 Humanities: 44.36  Other: 39.58
下一步：freeze微调相应代码
